title: "Comprehensive machine learning based study of the chemical space of herbicides"
excerpt: "Widespread use of herbicides results in the global increase in weed resistance. The rotational use of herbicides according to their modes of action (MoAs) and discovery of novel phytotoxic molecules are the two strategies used against the weed resistance."
